review.author: DevOps
review.findings: Comms v2 heartbeat: lastSeen tracking on all inbound WS frames, health-check endpoint with 60s stale threshold, hm-send preflight skips WS when target stale. Backwards-compatible (null health = proceed normally). No memory leaks (bounded maps, 3 entries max). Reviewer confirmed no regression to ACK-timeout-resend. Analyst verified protocol + flagged idle-pane concern (patched: all frames refresh lastSeen). 10 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
